original_text: For whoever would save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for my sake and the gospel's will save it.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기 목숨을 구원하고자 하면 잃을 것이요 누구든지 나와 복음을 위하여 자기 목숨을 잃으면 구원하리라

sentences.original_text: For whoever would save his life
but whoever loses his life for my sake and the gospel's
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 누구든지 나와 복음을 위하여 자기 목숨을 잃으면
